definition: to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
surname Xie
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to transport under guard

sentences.english: But experts said this was not a reason to start drinking.
sentences.chinese: 但是專家們認爲這並不能作爲開解喝酒的理由。

sentences.english: Every time she was gloomy, I would comfort her and straighten her out.
sentences.chinese: 每當她煩惱鬱悶時，我總是來開解安慰她。

sentences.english: Ease up trying to clean her, encourage her to regain the happy memories.
sentences.chinese: 逸升試圖開解她，鼓勵她重拾快樂的回憶。

sentences.english: As time goes by, we like each other, share with each other, comfort each other, and dissolve irritations with each other.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，相互喜歡，分享喜悅，安慰憂傷，開解煩惱。

sentences.english: Yu Fan hard clean eu non-success tenderly, but not poke into the eu non-success of the pain.
sentences.chinese: 餘凡努力開解薇芸，卻體貼地不戳到薇芸的痛楚。

definition: to talk sb round/to straighten sth out/to enlighten
to console/to soothe/relieved
magic transformation performed by Daoist immortal/fig. to reveal/to enlighten
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
to blame/to rebuke
not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
to be obsessive/to persist obstinately
at a loss to know what to do (idiom); bewildered
unpleasant talk/malicious words
to put oneself in sb else's shoes (idiom)
stubborn/willful/pigheaded/Taiwan pr. [zhi2 ao4]
incoherent speech/to talk without rhyme or reason (idiom)
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
to bind/to yoke/to impede
